title: Is Hot & Sour Soup "Authentic"?
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • Joanne Chang's Hot & Sour Soup (Food52)
  • Hot & Sour Soup recipe

Genius-Hunter Extra-Credit:

  • In Massachusetts? Keep an eye out for Flour Bakery's upcoming pop-ups
  • Check out Joanne's Flour Week series on Instagram

Special thanks to listeners Haris and Arati (@aratimenon) for your MOM stories!

Have a genius recipe you'd like to start? Tell me about it at genius@food52.com.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Food52)

itunes:title: Is Hot & Sour Soup "Authentic"?
itunes:author: Food52
itunes:summary: Kristen checks in with chef and co-owner of Flour Bakery and Myers & Chang Joanne Chang—they discuss how the past year has gone, "the mom test," and what authenticity means to Joanne in her work.
